1551712265_1C1gnFcVv9J9kUjF4odDMRYcEWVPJ.body:
What about "save as zip"?
I mean if someone saves an archive of the zites folder, would it be possible to re-add the zite with all content under a different zite-hash?
I mean that should be the whole idea of "Save as zip"... otherwise a zite would be lost anyway and couldnt be resurrected in case the original ceases to exists...?
